name: In re Petition of SANDS BETHWORKS GAMING LLC for Authorization to Conduct Table Games Pursuant to 4 PA.C.S. § 1312A(a). Petition of Bethworks Now LLC
name_abbreviation: In re Sands Bethworks Gaming LLC

parties: In re Petition of SANDS BETHWORKS GAMING LLC for Authorization to Conduct Table Games Pursuant to 4 PA.C.S. § 1312A(a). Petition of Bethworks Now LLC.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of July, 2010, it is ORDERED that the Motion to Transfer Matter to Another Court is granted. The Petition for Review shall be transferred to the Commonwealth Court. The Motion to Stay the Filing of Certified Record and Stay the Setting of Briefing Schedule is denied as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
2 A.3d 469
In re Petition of SANDS BETHWORKS GAMING LLC for Authorization to Conduct Table Games Pursuant to 4 PA.C.S. § 1312A(a). Petition of Bethworks Now LLC.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 27, 2010.
